subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ryan Howard and the Philadelphia Phillies agreed to a three-year, $54 million contract, avoiding a potentially contentious arbitration hearing. Howard, the 2006 National League most valuable player, will earn $15 million this season, $19 million next year and $20 million in 2011.
